Property Location
With a stay at Espahotel Plaza Basílica in Madrid (Santiago Bernabeu), you'll be close to Museo Tifologico and Plaza Mayor. This apartment is within close proximity of Santiago Bernabeu Stadium and Green Canal Golf.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 80 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and minibars.

Dining
Take advantage of the apartment's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a safe deposit box at the front desk and an elevator (lift). Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.
